DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Tell me about yourself.
RESPONSE TEXT: Oh uh... well, I'm a scientist. You've probably met my wife, Julianna, already. Not sure what else to say really.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Tell me about yourself.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Tell me about yourself.
RESPONSE TEXT: Oh wonderful! No one else here really wants to talk about it.
Functionally this model is more or less the same as the previous versions I worked on, but without the neural inhibitor and reconditioning.
The voice modulator seems to have some minor issues interfacing with the neural matrix, which can add some moodiness.
But that's easily solved with regular tune ups.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Tell me about yourself.
RESPONSE TEXT: I'm afraid that's really all I should say about it. I mean it IS still classified, but I wanted to help with the investigation.
SCRIPT NOTES: earnest. You are being totally honest.

RESPONSE TEXT: Very well, I'll just get back to my work then.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I heard that Julianna and Ezra had an argument a few days before he was found dead. Tell me about that.
RESPONSE TEXT: That's what allows us to recreate our original voices. They can mimic any normal human voice, actually.

RESPONSE TEXT: Maintaining our original voices helps reinforce the neural network, sort of like playing music for an Alzheimer's patient.
